Total number of projects: 614

Project 0: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12147_en


6 months assisting in after-school & summer activities for children

Středisko volného času, p.o. (TYMY Centrum)

Holešov, Czech Republic

Apply

Project description

TYMY Centrum in Czech Republic is looking for a volunteer to take part in the voluntary service. The project will be focused on free time and extra-curricular activities for children and youth (marginal focus on adults as well), public outdoor events (e.g. the Day of Europe, Children's Day, Welcoming summer holidays, festivals, competitions, etc.), promotion of such activities and of other general issues (e.g. volunteering) among youngsters, etc. The volunteer will spend 6-7 months working in the Organisation - 5 months on its premises in Holešov (over the school year from April to October 2019) and 2 months at summer camps away from Holešov (July and August 2019). Activities will include: helping organise/assisting in hobby clubs (so called ‘kroužky’), help with one-off events a trips for children, game days and nights, decoration of weekend events, etc. run by the organisation; helping with everyday running of the organisation and preparation of activities; and much more.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Accommodation will be arranged in a furnished, privately rented flat shared with another volunteer. Meals are not usually provided by the organisation, so the volunteer is expected to arrange their meals themselves using the money given to them for this purpose (=food allowance). The volunteer can walk from their flat, not far away to the place where activities will be usually held. The participant can also make use of the bicycle, which they can borrow from the hosting organisation. Transport to far-off events is arranged by cars of organisation or public transport.

Training during the project

Language lessons: The participant must attend Czech language lessons provided by on-line courses at regular intervals (2-4 hours/week recommended). The participant can adjust the amount of time according to their needs, but they have to make sure they are able to communicate and make themselves understood in Czech well enough to be able to develop certain activities. Volunteer’s trainings: The participant is expected to attend: - Pre-Departure Training, Compulsory: On-Arrival and Mid-term Training, Final Evaluation

Volunteer profile

– CREATIVE – This is important as many of the activities you will be involved in requires a creative spirit and a spirit of initiative. – COMMUNICATIVE – You have to be able to communicate with the staff, either orally or by gestures; active English is important, as well as your own will to learn basic Czech. This project is not suitable for too shy individuals because the active communication with children (not necessary by words) is essential during activities. – RESPONSIBLE – This is obvious since you will be working with children and should act as their role model. Clean criminal record.

Placement dates

A total of 30 week(s) during the period 01/04/2019 to 31/10/2019

Placement location

Sokolská 70, 769 01 Holešov

Looking for volunteers from

Italy, Spain, Germany, Austria, Poland, Hungary, Slovakia, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Netherlands

Placement topics

Education and training

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 30/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 1: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12143_en


Local You(th)

Svjetski savez mladih Hrvatska

Zagreb, Croatia

Apply

Project description

The project will be held in Zagreb from May 15th to November 15th 2019, long term EVS (European Voluntary Service ) Local you(th) combines international volunteering experience with education and action in the field of youth work. The purpose of this placement is to equip two young people with the skills and knowledge that they can use in working with the youth in their local community and give them the practical experience in actively engaging in local community and youth projects. Two successful candidates will work on the “Local you(th)” project at the multicultural and dynamic environment of the WYA Croatia office. As part of the project, the candidates will receive training on International Law and Human Rights, participate in a Croatian language course, write blog, conduct research on Youth problems in the local community, and organize different youth workshops and activities (such as debates, cultural events, movie nights, trainings, social media campaigns,presentations,etc

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Accommodation is fully covered and free of charge. The facilities are fully equipped with furniture and independent heating system. There is also internet connection to the whole area. Volunteers are responsible for cleaning and preserving their accommodation. You will be living with other people in an apartment or a student dorm (if you are a student) Travel budget: fully covered after service programme is finished Food money for 4 weeks: 150 Euros Pocket money for 4 weeks: 150/155 Euros You wil receive money on a monthly basis.

Training during the project

You will receive on arrival and mid term training for al EVS volunteers on Coratia, organized by National Agency. If you will be interrested WYA Croatia gives you the opportunity to participate on training following topics like human rights, democracy, active citizenship and human dignity. As part of the project you will receive language support training which will give you an overview of Croatian.

Volunteer profile

The successful candidates should: • be age 18 – 30 • be of any nationality, but have a residence in Belgium • be proactive, flexible, easy to communicate with • be ready to learn • be interested in learning about new culture • be interested in youth work and topics like human dignity, human rights,youth activism in local communites, democracy youth process • be ready to engagge in local community work • be motivated to promote their work on social media of the hosting organization • be motivated to learn and gain new experiences and skills

Placement dates

A total of 26 week(s) during the period 15/05/2019 to 15/11/2019

Placement location

Vlaška 31, 10 000 Zagreb

Looking for volunteers from

Belgium

Placement topics

Citizenship and democratic participation

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 08/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 2: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12142_en


! ONLY FOR GERMAN OR AUSTRIAN ! Service Civique Animation jeunesse

ICE-RF, Mairie de Saverne

SAVERNE, France

Apply

Project description

ICE-RF recrute des volontaires européens, pour effectuer un Service Civique, à la Mairie de Saverne, dans le cadre d'un projet bilingue franco/allemand pour la jeunesse. La mission se déroulera du 02/09/2019 au 31/07/2020. Il est demandé à chaque volontaire de participer à une préparation de 2,5 semaines au mois d'août 2019, à Niederbronn les Bains. Uniquement disponible pour un allemand ou autrichien !!! (statut service civique français) !!! Only for german or austrian!!! ICE-RF is recruiting european volunteers to do a Service Civique(french voluntary statute) in the "Mairie de Saverne". The mission is from the 02/09/2019 to the 31/07/2020. All volunteer has to take part on a 2,5 weeks preparation in august 2019, in Niederbronn-les-Bains. Some part of the project consist on german/french bilingual missions, so it's necessary to have good knowlege in these language.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Il sagit d'une collocation. Les volontaires disposeront de leur chambre à coucher individuelle et devront partager la cuisine, la salle de bains avec d'autres volontaires. The young volunteer will have his own bedroom, kitchen and bathroom are shared with other volunteers.

Training during the project

Il est demandé à chaque volontaire de participer à une préparation de 2.5 semaines, fin août 2019, à Niederbronn. D'autres rencontres de quelques jours auront lieu au mois de novembre 2019 et avril 2020. Before the beginning of the voluntary, in august 2019, everyone has to take part on a 2,5 weeks preparation, which included french courses, administrative tasks and many other activities. This seminar is good to meet other volunteers. It's organised by the coordinating organisation. 2 months and 8 months after the beginning the volunteer is invited to take part on another seminars.

Volunteer profile

!!! Only for german or austrian !!! - A motivated european young boy or girl from 18 to 25 years old, - ready to give 11 months of your time to others. - interested in discovering French culture. Some part of the project consist on german/french bilingual missions, so it's necessary to have good knowledge in these language !!! Only for german or austrian !!! (because of the french service civique statute) and the profil of the mission.

Placement dates

A total of 48 week(s) during the period 02/09/2019 to 31/07/2020

Placement location

67700 SAVERNE

Looking for volunteers from

Austria, Germany

Placement topics

Citizenship and democratic participation

Education and training

Creativity and culture

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 15/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 3: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12138_en


! ONLY FOR GERMAN OR AUSTRIAN ! Service Civique Animation jeunesse

ICE-RF, Réseau d'Animation Intercommunale

NIEDERBRONN LES BAINS, France

Apply

Project description

ICE-RF recrute des volontaires européens, pour effectuer un Service Civique, au Réseau d'Animation Intercommunale du pays de Niederbronn les Bains. La mission se déroulera du 02/09/2019 au 31/07/2020. Il est demandé à chaque volontaire de participer à une préparation de 2,5 semaines au mois d'août 2019, à Niederbronn les Bains. Une partie du projet consiste en des missions bilingues franco/allemande. !!! Uniquement disponible pour un allemand ou autrichien !!! (statut service civique français) !!! Only for german or austrian!!! ICE-RF is recruiting european volunteers to do a Service Civique(french voluntary statute) in the " Réseau d'Animation Intercommunale du pays de Niederbronn les Bains". The mission is from the 02/09/2019 to the 31/07/2020. All volunteer has to take part on a 2,5 weeks preparation in august 2019, in Niederbronn-les-Bains. Some part of the project consist on german/french bilingual missions, so it's necessary to have knowlege in these language.

Il sagit d'une collocation. Les volontaires disposeront de leur chambre à coucher individuelle et devront partager la cuisine, la salle de bains avec d'autres volontaires. The young volunteer will have his own bedroom, kitchen and bathroom are shared with other volunteers.

Il est demandé à chaque volontaire de participer à une préparation de 2.5 semaines, fin août 2019, à Niederbronn. D'autres rencontres de quelques jours auront lieu au mois de novembre 2019 et avril 2020. Before the beginning of the voluntary, in august 2019, everyone has to take part on a 2,5 weeks preparation, which included french courses, administrative tasks and many other activities. This seminar is good to meet other volunteers. It's organised by the coordinating organisation. 2 months and 8 months after the beginning the volunteer is invited to take part on another seminars.

Volunteer profile

Some part of the project consist on german/french bilingual missions, so it's necessary to have knowledge in these language. !!! Only for german or austrian !!! (because of the french service civique statute) and the profil of the mission.

Project 4: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12134_en


Call to work in a cultural association

Stowarzyszenie Kulturalne „Pocztówka”

Kleszczele, Poland

Apply

Project description

Do you want to improve your skills and get professional experience? Keep reading... We offer the opportunity to work in our theatre team: in the production and presentation of performances; or organizing an international festival of open-air theatre; or creating print design and social media; or managing the projects.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The worker will have a gross salary of PLN 2,250.00 per month. Insurance is included. The accommodation will be shared with other employees in a rented flat in the city of Hajnówka in Podlasie, a unique region in eastern Poland with a rich history and traditions, surrounded by beautiful Białowieza forest.

Training during the project

We offer legal employment in Poland under a work contract with the following conditions: - Work time: 1 year, 5 days a week, 8 hours a day / but we prefer flexible working time / - Possibility of additional training - Possibility of participating in A3Teatr trips. - Possibility of implementing your own project. - Interesting work, not standard in a great team

Volunteer profile

We are looking for a person / position for: 1. Art manager: artistic entrepreneur, drafting and coordination of EU projects. 2. Graphic designer, creation of promotional impressions, social network service. 3. Creative plastic: creation of costumes, theatrical scenery. Please, send us your CV, motivation letter and portfolio. We will contact the selected people by email and for a Skype interview.

Placement dates

A total of 1 week(s) during the period 01/05/2019 to 30/04/2020

Placement location

Policzna 40, 17-250 Kleszczele

Looking for volunteers from

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Denmark, Estonia, Greece, Spain, Finland, France, Croatia, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Latvia, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Sweden, Slovenia, Slovakia, Turkey, United Kingdom

Placement topics

Education and training

Employment and entrepreneurship

Creativity and culture

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 15/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.

Project 5: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12131_en


Support NGO's Office in Italy for French Volunteers

Associazione Soci Costruttori - IBO Italia

Ferrara, Italy

Apply

Project description

IBO Italia is an NGO which operates in Italy since 1957. The mission of IBO is to promote access to education and training as fundamental rights of every person and an opportunity for the whole community to change and at the same time to involve youngster in volunteering paths main area: A) VOLUNTARY SERVICE IN ITALY AND ABROAD B) INTERNATIONAL COOPERATION C) EDUCATION TO GLOBAL CITIZENSHIP AND SENSITIZATION ACTIVITIES IN SCHOOLS AND TERRITORIES Main areas of tasks will be managing the registrations and supporting the placement of international volunteers in IBO workcamps abroad and in Italy. The general tasks will also include: • administrative work in a pre/post workcamp organisation • participating in national camp leader training and being camp leader in different workcamps, in Italy during the summer • assisting with promotion of mobility projects •support during the organization of meetings with volunteers •assisting with promotion of mobility projects

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteers will be housed at the office of IBO Italia, situated near the town center. Inside the office it will be possible to benefit of a Wi-Fi, a washing machine, towels, blankets. As far as concerned the participants involved in workcamps during the summer, board and lodging will be guaranteed by the different social realities that host the workcamp. The volunteers will receive a food allowance of approx. 120 Euro/each per month from IBO. Inside the office of IBO it is possible to benefit of a kitchen. During the workcamps food arrangement is guaranteed by the community.

Volunteer profile

• previous experience in education/animation • ability to work independent and in a team • strong interest in the topic, in workcamps and non-formal learning • predisposition for leadership • ability to coordinate a group (10 to 25 volunteers) • good knowledge of English language is necessary • basic knowledge of Italian language is an asset • min. age 20 y/o

Placement dates

A total of 40 week(s) during the period 01/05/2019 to 31/01/2020

Placement location

Via Boschetto, n°1, 44124 Ferrara

Looking for volunteers from

France

Placement topics

Education and training

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 15/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 6: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12128_en


Workshop coordination for Recycling Objects

Ressourcerie La Charpentière

La Riche, France

Apply

Project description

The “Ressourcerie” is a non profit. Created by and for its members (which we call inhabitants), funded in order to promote a circular economic system. Everyday, locals donate some objects they do not want to keep anymore. Many of these second-handed items are resold in our thrift store. Whether these items are broken or obsolete, people are invited to come and try to repair, relook or transform them in our workshops. The purpose is to promote popular education and to mix people from any ethnic and social background. Everyone can join the different activities throughout the week: objects repairing, wood manufacturing, cooking, sawing, gardening etc. You will be in charge of organizing the workshops logistics and welcoming the inhabitants and potential future members. The workshops usually take part three days a week. You will be invited to take part in the life of the structure: weekly meetings, open administrative councils and any other meetings related to specific matters.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The accommodation will be provided for the volunteer, a single room in a private house or in a shared apartment. Volunteers receive pocket money (183€ p/ month), a food allowance (180€ p/ month), and all costs associated with the mission (public transportation, bike...) will be covered. Travel costs will be covered to a maximum of 275 euro for the round-trip. The tickets can be bought by the sending organization or by the volunteer, who will send the reimbursement after presenting the original tickets upon arrival.

Training during the project

You will have french classes and other training related to the activities you wish to participate.

Volunteer profile

We hope the volunteer will have lots of energies to share and a strong taste for diversity and contact with other people. Here at the “Ressourcerie”, we enjoy sharing knowledge and learning from each other; if you have any creative skills you would like to share, you could even organize a new workshop in that field. Any level of French language is welcome. Send us a mail and tell us why you wish to join!

Placement dates

A total of 44 week(s) during the period 30/08/2019 to 28/06/2020

Placement location

2 Rue Marcel Dassault, 37520 La Riche

Looking for volunteers from

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Denmark, Estonia, Greece, Spain, Finland, France, Croatia, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Latvia, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Sweden, Slovenia, Slovakia, Turkey, United Kingdom

Placement topics

Environment and natural protection

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 10/05/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 7: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12127_en


Solo per Italiani: Volontariato di 3 mesi con Foundation SEED

Foundation SEED

SAMOKOV, Bulgaria

Apply

Project description

Il progetto mira a: 1.) Creare una comunità basata sul lavoro di gruppo e sulla creazione di un ambiente favorevole. 2.) Contribuire all'aspetto europeo della città in cui è implementato il progetto. 3.) Aumentare le capacità e le conoscenze professionali e personali dei giovani inclusi nel progetto. 4.) Promuovere attività di volontariato. 5.) Aumentare la consapevolezza culturale. 6.) Offrire ai volontari l'opportunità di imparare come organizzare e pianificare feste ed eventi culturali. 7.)Scambio di esperienze tra organizzazioni partner nel campo della cultura. 8.) Migliorare le capacità professionali e personali dei volontari. La partecipazione al progetto darà il offre ai volontari l'opportunità di prendere parte a un'attività che ha dimostrato di avere uno scopo positivo ma limitato impatto sulla comunità locale.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

I volontari vivranno in un appartamento condiviso. Riceveranno 4€ al giorno, pagati in unica soluzione ad inizio mese come pocket money. Inoltre, riceveranno 170€ al mese come vitto.

Volunteer profile

Stiamo cercando volontari motivati ​​con le seguenti qualità: età compresa tra 18 e 30 anni; giovani di mentalità aperta che sono interessati alle nostre aree di attività, in particolare alla cultura; con una conoscenza di base dell'inglese e la motivazione per migliorarlo; disponibilità a partecipare attivamente alle nostre attività. Non è richiesta nessuna esperienza pregressa o nessuna competenza in particolare. Per partecipare invia cover letter e CV in inglese a molfetta@incoweb.org

Placement dates

A total of 12 week(s) during the period 01/04/2019 to 31/07/2019

Placement location

SAMOKOV

Looking for volunteers from

Italy

Placement topics

Social challenges

Creativity and culture

Placement deadline

No application deadline

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.

Project 8: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12118_en


Ambassadors of Europe and mobility

Maison de l'Europe en Mayenne

Laval, France

Apply

Project description

There are two distinct placements: - 1 German volunteer in The House of Europe - Tasks: Ambassador of mobility (informing young people about ESC, Erasmus+ mobility programs etc. and his own experience in high schools, youth centers etc.) Creating activities about EU and its cultures (including Volunteer's country) for children and teenagers, held in schools, youth organisations... Participation to a project related to the 30th anniversary of the Berlin Wall Fall Helping in communication Giving German courses for beginners - 1 EU volunteer in Habitat Jeunes - Tasks : Creating animations for the evenings in the 3 houses Habitat Jeunes of Laval (cultural evenings, sport events, movies...) Helping in the preparation of the “Week Habitat Jeunes” Participating in the translation of documents such as flyers, posters etc. Managing a Facebook page and a newsletter Setting up activities linked with European mobility Both vacancies are coordinated by the House of Europe.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The accommodation will be in a home for young workers (Habitat Jeunes) in Laval city center to facilitate the 2 volunteers’ social integration. They will have their own room but they will share an apartment together with a third person. They will be surrounded by French and foreign young people and will have the possibility to participate in sport and cultural activities proposed by Habitat Jeunes. There is possibility to eat in the canteen or to prepare your own meals. In counterpart, the volunteers will be asked to respect the rules of the home: avoiding making noise after 22:00, etc.

Training during the project

Volunteers will follow a starting seminar at the beginning of their projects with other foreign volunteers in France. They will have a second seminar in the middle of the project. These seminars are compulsory and organised by the French National Agency. OLS courses in French or another language.

Volunteer profile

House of Europe: -from EU country, preference for Germany -Motivation and interest in the European Union -Experience in the field of intercultural exchanges -Experience in the field of youth animation -Good knowledge of German (if possible mothertongue) French and/or English at Habitat Jeunes: -From EU country -Interest in animation -Team work -Open-minded and curious -Good communication skills in English (at least) and French -Good ICT skills (internet, social networks…) -A first experience in animation would be great

Placement dates

A total of 44 week(s) during the period 02/09/2019 to 30/06/2020

Placement location

38 rue Noémie Hamard, 53000 Laval

Looking for volunteers from

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Denmark, Estonia, Greece, Spain, Finland, France, Croatia, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Latvia, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Sweden, Slovenia, Slovakia, Turkey, United Kingdom

Placement topics

Citizenship and democratic participation

Education and training

Creativity and culture

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 08/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.

Project 9: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12107_en


Same chances for all children

Centre Social L'Orange Bleue

Clichy-sous-bois, France

Apply

Project description

The Orange Bleue is looking for someone to participate to one of this most important activity domain : activities with young kids (2-6 years old). In the very poor class neighborhood of Bas-Clichy, all questions about parentality is very important. That's why the center hope someone motivate to help it about. Help kids in their first years school support, animate little workshops for families, playing with all in the open gaming space, help to organize some gaming events are examples of what the volunteer can do. Of course, he or she can makes this own event if he/she has an appropriate idea.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The host of the volunteer at the settlement is made in a time when four partners organizations do the same thing, and each volunteers will be accomodated in a free common accomodation. In addition the coordinating association will provide a budget to finance food needs (422 euros each month) and a valid transport pass.

Training during the project

Two seminars will be provide by the french agency to help volunteers in their experiments. In addition, more training will be provided, depending each volunteer profiles and capacities.

Volunteer profile

Working with the spanish support organization DON BOSCO (Santiago de Compostela), we are searching for someone who want to work with kids, if possible with some gaming and specifically boardgaming interest. To speak french or english is not abolutly necessary, but french basics will help for school support sessions.

Placement dates

A total of 54 week(s) during the period 01/09/2019 to 31/08/2020

Placement location

22 allée Frédéric Ladrette, 93390 Clichy-sous-bois

Looking for volunteers from

Spain

Placement topics

Education and training

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 13/07/2019

Project 10: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12103_en


Solo per Italiani: Volontariato nel distretto di Atochas, A Coruña

Biblioteca Veciñal Campo de Marte s/n

A CORUÑA, Spain

Apply

Project description

Il progetto sarà sviluppato nella città di A Coruña, nel distretto di Atochas - Monte Alto. Quartiere di una natura popolare, molto ben collegato con il resto della città, con molti piccoli negozi e servizi. Questa popolazione è molto partecipativa quando sviluppa progetti di natura sociale, facilitando il lavoro di persone che vogliono ideare nuovi progetti. Si tratta di un 'area di svago gastronomico, storico ed artistico. I compiti principali del volontario saranno di rafforzare l'attività della biblioteca di quartiere e collaborare per promuovere progetti che verranno sviluppati durante l'anno. Attualmente, ad esempio, stiamo promuovendo la creazione di un "giardino urbano educativo comune" con le scuole dell'area.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Il volontario vivrà in un appartamento condiviso con altri volontari. Coperti dal progetto pocket money, vitto e transporti.

Training during the project

Il volontario parteciperà a due training (arrival e mid-term) organizzati dall' Agenzia nazionale Spagnola.

Volunteer profile

Conoscenza base della lingua spagnola. Persona flessibile, motivata ed open-mind. Per partecipare invia CV e lettera di motivazione a molfetta@incoweb.org.

Placement dates

A total of 40 week(s) during the period 01/09/2019 to 31/05/2020

Placement location

15002 A CORUÑA

Looking for volunteers from

Italy

Placement topics

Social challenges

Citizenship and democratic participation

Creativity and culture

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 31/05/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 11: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12099_en


Solo per Italiani: Volontariato a Coruña, Spagna, con persone disabili

ADCOR

A Coruña, Spain

Apply

Project description

La Fondazione ADCOR è un'organizzazione no profit dedicata a migliorare la vita degli adulti dipendenti. Il volontario collaborerà in: Centri occupazionali, servizi specializzati di assistenza per adulti con disabilità intellettive. finalizzati a fornire competenze professionali, personali e sociali, con l'obiettivo di raggiungere il massimo sviluppo personale, lavorativo e sociale. Il volontario sosterrà le persone con disabilità gravi che non possono integrarsi nel centro occupazionale all'interno dei Centri diurni. Sempre con il supporto dello staff, lui / lei collaborerà e aiuterà le persone con disabilità negli esercizi di mobilità, logopedia (supportando lo staff con esercizi di pronuncia di formazione meccanismi di voce), abilità sociali e personali. Il volontariato svolgerà servizi di assistenza personale, supporto per le attività della vita quotidiana, animazione nel Centro per anziani.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Alloggio, cibo e trasporto sono coperti dal progetto.

Volunteer profile

Il volontario dovrebbe essere interessato a lavorare con persone disabili e persone anziane; avere un livello base di conoscenza della lingua spagnola ed essere comunicativo, aperto, allegro, creativo, motivato a lavorare in gruppo. Per partecipare Invia il tuo CV e la lettera di motivazione in inglese a molfetta@incoweb.org.

Placement dates

A total of 40 week(s) during the period 01/06/2019 to 29/02/2020

Placement location

15011 A Coruña

Looking for volunteers from

Italy

Placement topics

Social challenges

Health and wellbeing

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 30/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 12: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12095_en


Banca del Fare - restoration of old stone and wood houses in Italy

Parco Culturale Alta Langa

Castelletto Uzzone, Italy

Apply

Project description

The Parco Culturale Alta Langa is a non-profit territorial association situated in Monesiglio, region of Piemonte, northern Italy, which purposes are: •promoting knowledge of Alta Langa area in its various forms (historical, artistic, literary, architectural, gastronomic); •helping to develop a healthy, positive form of tourism; •promote educational activities, in order to develop the local culture for youth and adults. The association's main project is Banca del Fare*, a summer school about the restoration of traditional stone houses that aims to: •Address the abandonment and degradation of the region. •Transmit indispensable knowledge and building techniques related to stone constructions, before it is lost. •Raise awareness that the heritage our forefathers have left us, everywhere in the world, should be protected and defended. *Banca del Fare literally means the doing bank and refers to learning by doing.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The campus is located in Cascina Crocetta, an ancient hamlet built according to the traditional techniques, about 10 minutes’ drive from the closest village, the tiny Castelletto Uzzone. The staff, the volunteers and the students will be living at Cascina Crocetta, that offers a hostel with 20 beds, 8 bathrooms, a cafeteria offering cooked meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner, a laundry machine. The surrounding area is rich in small villages, delicious eateries, medieval castles, and beautiful trails all to discover. All local transports are provided by the school's van.

Training during the project

-Rediscover the manual work as a “union between hand and mind”, that has been lost in the most recent generations. -Experience the building site in person, taking part in every step of the construction process. -Deepen the technological knowledge about renovation, through theoretical lessons and practical workshops. -Empower self-confidence, self-esteem and entrepreneurship, contributing to create such a complex project as rebuild a stone house. -To interact with the community surrounding the campus, through a daily exchange of cultural activities, events, festivals. -To learn Italian.

Volunteer profile

We're looking for 2 volunteers, one from Portugal and one from Spain, who are interested on manual work such as craftsmen/craftswomen and young people with an architecture/engineering background, interested in the area of building with natural materials, restoration of ancient buildings and self-build construction. The volunteers should also be able to live with people from several backgrounds in an isolated, surrounded by nature environment.

Placement dates

A total of 26 week(s) during the period 01/06/2019 to 30/11/2019

Placement location

Cascina Crocetta, 12070 Castelletto Uzzone

Looking for volunteers from

Portugal, Spain

Placement topics

Creativity and culture

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 20/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 13: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12091_en


Solo per Italiani: Volontariato a Coruña, Spagna, con ragazzi disabili

AIND

A Coruña, Spain

Apply

Project description

AIND è un'associazione senza scopo di lucro dedita alla formazione e all'integrazione delle persone con disabilità intellettuali. Pittura, teatro, danza, artigianato, cucito, cucina, laboratori di letteratura, stampa e comunicazione, il cui obbiettivo sarà di promuovere l'integrazione sociale delle persone con disabilità migliorando la loro autostima, responsabilità, facilitando l'acquisizione e lo sviluppo di nuove competenza, al fine di raggiungere la massima autonomia possibile. Le attività si svolgeranno nel pomeriggio, a partire dal 15 settembre e termineranno il 15 giugno, con i periodi festivi corrispondenti (Natale, Pasqua ...)

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Sistemazione in un appartamento condiviso con più volontari che partecipano ad altri progetti coordinati dalla Fundacion Paideia, a La Coruña, in Galizia, Spagna. Il volontario riceverà pocket money e denaro per vitto e transporto.

Volunteer profile

Conoscenza basica della lingua spagnola. Flessibile, di larghe vedute e motivato. È preferibile che il volontario abbia un forte motivazione a lavorare e collaborare con persone con disabilità. Per partecipare invia Cv e lettera di motivazione a molfetta@incoweb.org

Solidarity for a cleaner future

ANMRF LOUIS PASTEUR, CLUB VOLTIN - BRAILA

BRAILA, Romania

Apply

Project description

The project "Solidarity for a cleaner future" is lasting 9 months (15.05-2019- 14.02.2020) in Braila, Romania and it is implemented by ANMRF LOUIS PASTEUR BRAILA. The aim of the project is to create an ecological consciousness designed to offer the hope of a common future, HUMAN - ENVIRONMENT and confirms the idea that man is the most important resource-value for sustainable development. OBJECTIVE 1 Awareness raising and awareness of 6 volunteers from the European Solidarity Corps (Turkey,Georgia, Republic of Moldova),8 young beneficiaries in NEET situations and 100 Romanian pupils/youth of community members and local authorities on the importance of environmental protection and the discovery of some ways of involving young people in green activities over a 7-month period. OBJECTIVE 2 Developing during the 7month of 5 actions to learn environmental values by organizing excursions, hikes for / with youngsters and children aged 10-30 years, ESC volunteers and local ones.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements will be supported by the host organization.

Volunteer profile

We will consider the applications of young people who: - live in rural areas with reduced amenities or peripheral regions - have poor social skills or antisocial behavior - come from single parent families or orphans - have low living standards, low incomes - face long-term unemployment.

Resita, Romania

Project description

The Association it’s a noprofit apolitical organisation which was founded by a group of teachers, roma activists and roma students, in the south-west part of Romania in 2008. Due to it`s involvement in numerous projects concerning education, youth and voluntary work, the association has decided to develop a project that can combine all these three. Volunteer´s tasks: - Daily activities in the form of language classes in schools (both with teachers and alone in after-school) in 5 middle/high-schools, using nonformal education methods with the aim to make the educational activity more attractive for kids; Awareness campaigns relating to the need for an active youth and how the Erasmus+ programme is contributing to that; Monthly activities to promote Erasmus+ and volunteering, and to recruit new volunteers; Volunteering activities at various events organised by our associate partners; Projects of the volunteers which promote civic involvement, participation, volunteering and tolerance

Project description

To support staff and volunteers in various youth center settings across Bournemouth and Dorset to delivery youth action projects. To support staff to plan youth work activities and sessions. Building professional relationships with the young people within youth sessions, promoting well-being and providing guidance and advice. Encourage children and young people to engage in activities such as cooking, arts and crafts, table tennis, pool and outdoor games. Attend conferences, meetings or training sessions related to youth work and the organisation. Deliver youth action projects within the community for young people and support them to design and deliver community events. To evaluate the projects and children and young people’s development through using evaluation tools. Assist staff in delivering holiday activities for children and young people. Help in producing promotional materials: magazines, posters, videos, etc with young people. Assisting with administrative tasks.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

SVE en Italie YOUTH CROSSROADS [only for french people]

CESIE

ROME, Italy

Apply

Project description

L'organisation d'accueil CECIE va accueillir 6 volontaires SVE pour le projet YOUTH CROSSROADS. Le but de ce projet est de promouvoir la citoyenneté active, l'inclusion sociale et la solidarité entre tous les jeunes en les impliquant dans des groupes sociaux variés. Mobilité et volontariat sont des outils éducatifs très efficace pour l'intégration, donc de soutenir ces compétences et valeurs aide également à entrer sur le marché du travail. YOUTH CROSSROADS cherche à établir des relations positives entre les volontaires, les organisations d'accueil, les centres d'accueil et les écoles. Le/La volontaire va aider à intégrer des personnes immigrées et des nouveaux arrivants (surtout des mineurs non accompagnés) dans la société. Pour plus d'informations : https://europa.eu/youth/solidarity/placement/10959_en

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Les volontaires vont être logés dans des chambres partagées avec une personne du même sexe dans le centre-ville. Il y a une cuisine partagée, WC et salle de bains ainsi que WiFi. Toutes les associations avec qui CESIE travaille se trouvent au centre-ville, la plupart à 15 min à pied de l'appartement. CESIE va couvrir les coûts des transports publics pour ceux qui sont plus éloignées. Au début de chaque mois, le/la volontaire recevra 175€ pour la nourriture et 120€ comme argent de poche.

Training during the project

- formation d'arrivée dans le bureau de CESIE - évaluation finale par l'agence nationale - cours de langue en ligne plus 40 heures d'Italien à l'Institut Italien de Langues.

Volunteer profile

avoir entre 18 et 30 ans- niveau d'Anglais (B2) - intéressé par le thème du projet; Migrants, Intégration des réfugiés, Jeunesse - connaissances de bases & expériences autour des projets européens (ERASMUS+ programme) - grande motivation d'avoir une expérience interculturelle -

Placement dates

A total of 57 week(s) during the period 01/05/2019 to 31/05/2020

Placement location

Via Roma, 94, 90133 ROME

Looking for volunteers from

France

Placement topics

Citizenship and democratic participation

To make something of one's life-Lebenshof Ludwigsdorf

Lebenshof Ludwigsdorf

Görlitz, Germany

Apply

Project description

The project „Lebenshof“ has the goal to give a second chance to young people without graduation and professional training and was founded by Christian people. Our offer is a combination of school and practical training called “Produktionsschule” The young people have the opportunity to get the graduation and also to work in the different workshops In the project “Lebenshof” about twenty young people can find a new perspective on their lives after leaving school early or other personal difficulties. Especially the possibility to get a school-leaving certificate in one or two years motivates youngsters to participate in the project. In addition to the theoretical lessons practical knowledge in the fields of ceramics work shop, woodworking shop, garden and kitchen can be are acquired. Tasks of the volunteer: - Support and guidance for young people in the workshops - Participation in the monthly training days for youths - Personal support for the adolescents with learning difficulties

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteer will live in a shared flat with other international volunteers in Görlitz. Weekly lunch is provided in the project. A bike is available or a ticket for bus from Görlitz to Ludwigsdorf.

Training during the project

German language course, intercultural training

Volunteer profile

- interest in the work with disadvantaged young people - able to work practical with wood or clay - open-minded for Christian values - basic knowledge of German is an advantage

Placement dates

A total of 54 week(s) during the period 01/09/2019 to 31/08/2020

Do your EVS/ESC in the heart of Europe. Budapest!

Hungarian Charity Service of the Order of Malta

Budapest, Hungary

Apply

Project description

Volunteers will work at the Hungarian Charity Service of the Order of Malta. This is one of the biggest non-profit organization in Hungary. The Main Office is situated on Batthyany Square next to the Danube from where you may see a fascinating view of the Hungarian Parliament. The mission of the organization: • care of the homeless • care and nursing of the lonely, elderly people • care and nursing of physically and mentally disabled people • institutional care of families, members of broken families and families with difficult financial background • care of abandoned children, orphans, vulnerable children and young people: maintaining institutions, providing services to bring them up, to teach them, to establish playgrounds for prevention • fundraising

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Food: Daily food allowance; the volunteer gets her/his food money from the Cashier of the Main Office every month on the same day. Accommodation: The volunteer is accommodated in a rented flat with a shared bathroom and kitchen, but the volunteer has a separate room with internet access. Her/his flat is next to the Main Building

Training during the project

Volunteers will join a one-week “Welcome to Hungary” training course in the first weeks of their project. In addition, there will be a mid term training, regular evaluation meetings and of course Hungarian language training.

Volunteer profile

We focus mainly on the motivation, openness and foreign language skills of applicants. We would host a volunteer who doesn’t know exactly how to help or how to be a ’good volunteer’. The best profile for us is if somebody is interested in structural, organizational questions and wants to turn her/his ideas into action by using her/his creativity. There’s opportunity to specialize since the volunteer can work as a youth worker and also as an elderly-carer. Thus we’re waiting for an open-minded, talkative young person who wants to know a lot about social area, solidarity with local communities.

Placement dates

A total of 20 week(s) during the period 01/09/2019 to 31/10/2020

Placement location

Szarvas Gábor út 58-60, H–1125 Budapest

Looking for volunteers from

Netherlands

Placement topics

Health and wellbeing

Placement deadline

EVS/ESC for sporty volunteers who want to go deep into the Middle-East

Palestine Sport 4 life

Ramallah, Palestine

Apply

Project description

Palestine Sport 4 life (PS4L) responds to developmental needs in the marginalized Palestinian communities through sports and life skills, operating in global context through aligning its developmental activities to the UN-SDGS, by implementing the following programs: Education and Child & Youth Development, Child Protection and Safeguarding, Economic Infrastructure Development and women & youth Empowerment, Health, Gender, Human Rights, Disability, Disaster Response and International Cultural Exchange. The main aim of this project is to empower the youth living in Palestine to become the leaders of their communities by teaching them life skills through various sports and activities carried out by our organization. Children and youth in Palestine live in a permanent conflict area. Living under occupation means that they cannot experience a normal, peaceful childhood. Our organization is trying to tackle this by using sports as tool to develop their life skills.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteer will receive 150 Euros as food allowance each month from Eastpackers. In addition, volunteers receive pocket money (90 euros) per month. There are private rooms in shared apartments with foreigners or locals.

Training during the project

The volunteer will be enrolled in a 30 Hour language course in a language center, taking classes twice a week.

Volunteer profile

Young persons from from 18 to 30 years who are interested to work with different people with different backgrounds. - Willingness to learn Arabian - Interested in working with youth, interested in democracy/history/politics - Able to take own initiative - Interested in the Middle East - Sportive

Placement dates

A total of 20 week(s) during the period 01/06/2019 to 30/06/2020

Ramallah

Looking for volunteers from

Netherlands

Assistenz für benachteiligte Kinder in Mera / Rumänien only for German

Fundatia Crestina Diakonia

Cluj-Napoca, Romania

Apply

Project description

Die Christian Foundation Diakonia (CFD) ist eine gemeinnützige Organisation, die Bildungs- und Freizeitprogramme für benachteiligte Kinder in Mera bei Cluj-Napoca (bedeutende Studentenstadt in Siebenbürgen) verantwortet. Hier werden hauptsächlich Ungarisch sprechende Kinder aus sozial schwachen Familien (z. T. Roma) tagsüber betreut und beim regelmäßigen Besuch der Schule, bei den Hausarbeiten und der Freizeitgestaltung unterstützt. Alle Aktivitäten haben zum Ziel, die Kinder sowohl in ihrem Lernprozess als auch in ihrer Persönlichkeitsentwicklung zu fördern, Defizite abzubauen und Perspektiven für die berufliche Entwicklung anzubahnen. In diesen Bereichen unterstützen die Freiwilligen die täglichen Aufgaben mit den Kindern (Betreuung beim Mittagessen, Hausaufgabenbetreuung, Spielen, kreative oder musikalische Angebote, interkulturelle Aktionen, Feste feiern).

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Der Freiwillige lebt in einer WG in Cluj-Napoca. Neben dem Zimmer des Freiwilligen gibt es ein Bad mit Waschmaschine sowie eine kleine Küche. Die Aufnahmeorganisation zahlt dem Freiwilligen einen monatlichen Festbetrag für die Verpflegung. Es ist aber auch möglich, im Projekt Mittag zu essen. Für die Fahrtkosten Cluj-Mera bekommt der Freiwillige ein Ticket für den Bus.

Training during the project

Sprachkurs Ungarisch

Volunteer profile

- ein Herz für benachteiligte Kinder, aber auch Konsequenz beim Umgang mit ihnen - Flexibilität und Toleranz gegenüber anderen Kulturen - mit einfachen Lebensumständen zurechtkommen - offen für das christliche Profil der Aufnahmeorganisation - Teamfähigkeit - Bereitschaft zum Lernen der Sprache der örtlichen Gemeinschaft (Ungarisch und Rumänisch)

EFD IN RENNES/BRETAGNE/FRANKREICH

Rennes, France

Apply

Project description

Bei diesem Freiwilligendienstprojekt werden 14 Freiwillige aus verschiedenen Ländern eingesetzt. Es geht um die Instandhaltung von historischen Bauten in der Nähe von Rennes. Hier mal ein paar Infos direkt von der Organisation: The volunteers will have two missions. The enhancement of Breton heritage and the development of relations with locals. So as to implement these missions, the volunteers will pass through three different stages: 1- Integration: from July 1st to 5th, the Team of Volunteers – Breizh, will be welcome to Rennes in order to have the integration period. In addition to some team buildings activities, the volunteers will have the chance to get to know the city and do some touristic activities. 2- Workcamp: from 5th July to 26nd July, the volunteers will go to Plêchatel, a small and welcoming village near Rennes. Every day, they will split into teams to carry out different activities. On one hand, a part of the team will work doing the maintenance of a trekking...

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

...path and the masonry on ancient Brittany heritage buildings. On the other hand, the other part of the international volunteer team will organize activities with the local population: intercultural café, stand on the market, sports, activities with the youth population of the village and kids, presentation of their countries, etc. The teams will be different each day so as to all the volunteers can perform all the activities. Saturdays and Sundays are days of and the volunteers can discover and enjoy the region! 3- Evaluation: to end up with the experience, from 26th July to 1st August...

Training during the project

...the volunteers will come back to Rennes in order to evaluate and assess the project.

Volunteer profile

18 - 30 To apply we still ask for a curriculum vitae, which gives a good idea about the candidate’s previous experiences. But it won’t be determining, we want to hear the reason of their application, to feel their motivation and their creativity! They candidates must either write a letter of motivation or make a short video where they talk about themselves and answer some questions: Who are you? Why are you interested in this project? What do you think about camping, to live in community in a foreign country during two months and to do physical work, do you have previous experiences?

Placement dates

A total of 4 week(s) during the period 01/07/2019 to 01/08/2019

Placement location

Rennes

Looking for volunteers from

Germany

Placement topics

Environment and natural protection

Creativity and culture

Do your EVS/ESC in the beautiful coastal town of Ferrol in Spain.

Xeración

Ferrol, Spain

Apply

Project description

Xeración is a non-profit organization established in 2013 with the aim to promote culture, arts, mobility and participation. Since then we develop project to promote a new youth culture: more European, tolerant and inclusive. Thus we organize regular workshops, presentations, courses, and exchanges. We are looking for active European volunteers to give us a hand organising linguistic tandems, talks in high schools, cultural activities, concerts and all the international projects Xeración is developing. We can offer you a full immersion in the Galician culture while you improve in a practical way linguistic, cultural and project management skills that will help you to integrate into the labour market at the end of the project.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Participant will receive 150 euros per month as food allowance plus pocket money according to European Solidarity Corps regulations. Accommodation will be in one of our centrical flats 10 minutes away from the office/atelier. Rooms can be single or double shared with other volunteers. Apartment is equipped with all needed utilities for living (linen, washing machine, Internet connection…).

Volunteer profile

Young persons from from 18 to 30 years who are interested to work with people with different backgrounds. - Willingness to learn Spanish - Interested in working with youth, interested in democracy/politics/culture - Able to take own initiative - Interested in Spanish culture

Project 25: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12043_en


ESC with National Trust Stackpole

National Trust Stackpole

Stackpole, United Kingdom

Apply

Project description

Stackpole is looking for 1 volunteer to help support their Education team. The volunteer helps assist the Education officer to run the education programmes for school visits. These are structured around the conservation framework of the John Muir Award that all visitor take part in while at Stackpole. Working with and supporting the Stackpole Outdoor Learning team using innovative and inspirational outdoor and environmental learning ensures a lasting experience for visitors for years to come. Tasks will include the assisting in the delivery of environmental education conservation, and related studies on a wide-ranging programme including outdoor adventure activities, developing teaching materials and helping to improve the school programme by sharing ideas and experience. For more info and how to apply, please visit http://www.unaexchange.org/walesevs/

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteers will live together in a shared accommodation on site. Stackpole has 3 volunteer accommodation cottages based on the estate and no more than 500m from the main office. The ESC volunteer will live together in shared accommodation and depending on the number of volunteers present, there may be single gender shared rooms on occasion but generally each will have their own separate bedroom but will share a kitchen, bathroom and communal reception room. Each month the volunteers will receive their pocket money and food allowance directly into their bank accounts.

Volunteer profile

National Trust is looking for volunteers with an interest in education and outdoors. We need you to be fit, active and and be willing to help with all aspects of running Stackpole Outdoor Learning Centre.

Placement dates

A total of 54 week(s) during the period 01/09/2019 to 31/08/2020

Placement location

Stackpole

Looking for volunteers from

Italy, Germany, Czech Republic, Austria, Belgium, France, Estonia, Spain

Placement topics

Environment and natural protection

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 15/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

ASH Wales

Project description

ASH Wales is looking for a volunteer who is interested in working with an established communications team to develop their graphic design skills. The main tasks will be the creation of artworks and promotional material in both print and digital form to support the charitable activities of the organisation. The volunteer will also be involved with web design and marketing. For more info please visit http://www.unaexchange.org/walesevs/

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteers will live centrally in Cardiff with other ESC volunteers in a shared house. Each person will have their own bedroom and will share kitchen, bathroom and living room. An amount of approximately £255 will be paid once a month for food, pocket money and internet.

Volunteer profile

Open to all young people aged 18 – 30 living in one of the 28 EU member countries, regardless of background, competences and experience. Volunteers ideally will: • Have experienced work with and/ or have an interest in graphic design, communication, social media and promotion • Have a good level of English and a commitment to improving their English (to be able to get the most from the placement) • Be flexible and adaptable to change • Be reliable • Have a willingness to develop projects and pieces of work according to interests.

Project 27: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12036_en


CANVAS 4

THERAPEFTIRIO XRONION PATHISEON "O AG VLASIOS"

LIVADEIA, Greece

Apply

Project description

“Ag Vlasios" is a Chronically Diseases Infirmary belonging to the Holy Metropolis of Thiva and Levadia and offers social services to persons seeking personal, psychological, medical, recreational and any other form of support. The inmates live inside the infirmary and the personnel takes care of them in accordance to medical and social department meeting the individual needs of each inmate. The Infirmary is located 3km away from Livadia city in “Tzimeika” area in a modern three story building. The social services provided by trained and specialized personnel for this work. Daily schedule involve personal care and keeping company to inmates, implementation of creative activities, and collaboration with other institution to promote voluntarism. We expect that young volunteers will express their willingness to participate in voluntary actions and give joy and happiness to inmates and gain personal experiences and develop life skills.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Volunteers’ accommodation will be in a rented flat with single bedrooms and shared bathroom & toilet, kitchen and sitting room. Volunteers are responsible for keeping the room and house, along with the other volunteers, clean and to take care of the equipment inside the house (electrical equipment, TV, beds, tables, chairs, among others). In case of damage due to willful negligence they may be asked to pay the repairing costs. Lunch and dinner will be prepared by professional cooks and provided on a daily Transportation to/from Infirmary is managed by the Infirmary’s internal transportation.

Training during the project

An introduction practical training will be realized at the beginning of EVS from the supervisors of the nursing department and from the social work department. The training will include practices fro volunteers to follow and actions to avoid and a special emphases will be given to safety of volunteers and inmates. Social worker will provide examples of creative activities and give the opportunity to implement under monitoring. Communication skills will be improved among volunteers and personnel and Greek language lessons will be given for helping them to integrate into local society.

Volunteer profile

– 18-30 years old – willing to follow the daily program – capable to create activities with simple materials by using their hands – skilled to provide physical education activities – open minded, in basics self-independent, responsible and with a strong motivation for international youth work and intercultural communication with elderly persons – capable to help in preparing international youth exchanges and activities; – motivated to learn basic Greek phrases in a short time; – playing an musical instrument which will be mostly appreciated; – able to communicate in english.

Placement dates

A total of 17 week(s) during the period 01/04/2019 to 31/07/2019

Placement location

TZIMEIKA LIVADEIAS, 32131 LIVADEIA

Looking for volunteers from

Austria

Placement topics

Health and wellbeing

Placement deadline

No application deadline

EVS/ESC in Scandinavian high lands. Vevelstad, Norway.

Vevelstad Frivilligsentral

Vevelstad, Norway

Apply

Project description

Als vrijwilliger zal je samen met een andere vrijwilliger meewerken in de plaatselijke vrijwilligerscentrale. Dit betekent dat je meehelpt met de bestaande activiteiten, zoals bijvoorbeeld ‘open café’ waar je samenwerkt met de ouderen, of ondersteunende taken uitvoert voor de kleine tweedehandswinkel. De huidige vrijwilligers hebben een jeugdclub opgezet, die de nieuwe vrijwilligers zullen voortzetten. Dit zal inhouden dat je wekelijks diverse activiteiten organiseert en begeleidt voor de jeugd in het dorp. Ook zal je de lokale jeugd begeleiden met de ‘jeugdraad’. Tevens is er veel ruimte voor het opzetten van eigen projecten voor de jeugd/ouderen/immigranten. Daarnaast zullen de vrijwilligers eventueel helpen bij plaatselijke evenementen. We bieden veel mogelijkheden voor persoonlijke groei!

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

De vrijwilliger zal worden opgevangen in een gastgezin. Het gastgezin zal de maaltijden en overnachting arrangeren. Alle overige benodigdheden voor maaltijden, overnachting etc. wordt door de hostfamilie betaald. Daarnaast krijgt de vrijwilliger nog een bedrag van €75,- dat besteed kan worden aan eten/drinken. De vrijwilliger wordt woonachtig in het centrum, op loopafstand van de vrijwilligerscentrale. Het gastgezin zal bijdragen aan een leenfiets.

Volunteer profile

Vrijwilligers moeten tussen de 18 en 30 jaar oud zijn die het leuk vinden om met verschillende soorten mensen te werken - Gemotiveerd zijn Noors te leren - Je moet tegen extreem weer kunnen - Het aankunnen om initiatief te nemen - Een grote interesse voor Scandinavië

Project 30: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12015_en


Volunteer for a forest outdoor nursery

Hnizdo - spolek pro komunitni vzdelavani

Tisnov, Czech Republic

Apply

Project description

Our main goal of volunteer’s engagement is to benefit from the continuous presence of a non-Czech speaker which should encourage the motivation of the children to practise English, non-verbal communication tools and enable natural understanding of cultural and other differences. The main contribution of volunteers will be their active participation in the club’s activities, simply be with children. Their other activities can include: -help with organizing and realization of daily programs, -prepare activities like creative workshops, experiments, children construction projects, etc. - assist children with basic self-care - actively participating in English lessons -accompany children on their daily excursions around the base or on bigger trips to cultural events. - preparation and organization of events for the public and the parents. During summer school holidays the nursery is partly open, the volunteer can also help with summer camps and preparation of a new school year.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteer will have his/her own bedroom in a flat in Tišnov. This flat will probably be shared with another volunteer, together they will use the kitchen and bathroom. Meals will be served in the nursery during school time, we can provide food even for vegan, gluten-free, etc. The volunteer will arrange his meal in the morning, in the evening and during weekends. The transport to/from the Forest Family Club could be arranged by parents driving their children. There is also quite a good bus connection and a bicycle or scooter can be provided if the volunteer is interested.

Training during the project

The volunteer will be offered Czech lessons with an experienced lector. Of course he/she can join all the training and seminars connected to the ESC programme. Also if they are interested, they can visit training, short time courses and seminars with other members of the nursery staff. They will also improve their communication, teaching, organising and language skills a lot. They will have a chance to experience the strong and weak points of this alternative grassroot educational project. They will get to know themselves in new situations.

Volunteer profile

The volunteer can be any enthusiastic person, who wants to have experience in work with children, who has an appropriate physical condition (the forest club program involves outdoor physical activities during all seasons) and mental fitness (the children can be sometimes noisy and very active). Open-mindedness, playfulness and sense of humour are appreciated as well as a good level of spoken English. We do not require any specific education. In case there are more applicants with a similar profile we prefer a person who can stay for a longer time, best option would be the whole year.

Placement dates

A total of 53 week(s) during the period 26/08/2019 to 25/08/2020

Placement location

Hornicka 900, 66603 Tisnov

Looking for volunteers from

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Denmark, Estonia, Greece, Spain, Finland, France, Croatia, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Latvia, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Sweden, Slovenia, Slovakia, Turkey, United Kingdom

Placement topics

Education and training

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 21/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 31: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12011_en


Volunteers for ZaHRAda - a friendly community school

Hnizdo - spolek pro komunitni vzdelavani

Tisnov, Czech Republic

Apply

Project description

We teach the children to see the world in a wider picture – and a foreigner volunteer can contribute to this. Our main goal of volunteer’s engagement is to benefit from the continuous presence of a non-Czech speaker which should encourage the motivation of the children to learn English and other languages. Main contribution of the volunteer will then be his/her active participation in school activities. The volunteer will perform many of the activities done by teacher’s assistants. From a certain point of view, the volunteer will be treated like the oldest child – taking part in games and group activities, he/she will - BE with children. He/she can also help with the class management, organise events for the public and for the parents, help with administration, photo gallery etc. He/she will also be encouraged to run his/her own workshop, hobby club etc. according to his/her interest. During summer holidays, volunteers can help with summer camps and preparation of the new school year.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteer will have his/her own bedroom in a flat in Tišnov. This flat will probably be shared with another volunteer, together they will use the kitchen and bathroom. Good internet connection is provided. Meals will be served in a school canteen during school time. We can even provide vegan of glutenfree diet. The volunteer will arrange his meal in the morning, in the evening and during weekends. Since Tišnov is a small town, it is easy to pass in on foot. If the volunteer shows interest, a bicycle or scooter can be provided. There is good train connection to the city of Brno.

Training during the project

The volunteer will be offered Czech lessons with an experienced lector. Of course he/she can join all the training and seminars connected to the ESC programme. Also if they are interested, they can visit training, short time courses and seminars with other members of the school staff. During the stay at the school they will improve their communication, teaching and language skills a lot. They will experience many different games and teaching methods, montessori pedagogical approaches and will be able to make their own opinion about the so-called innovative learning.

Volunteer profile

The volunteer can be anyone who wants to have experience in work with school aged children, who has an appropriate physical condition (the school involves outdoor physical activities during all seasons) and mental fitness (the children can be sometimes noisy and very active). Open-mindedness, playfulness and sense of humour are appreciated as well as a good level of spoken english. We do not require any specific education. In case there are more applicants with similar profile we prefer a person who can stay for a longer time, best option would be the whole year.

Placement dates

A total of 53 week(s) during the period 26/08/2019 to 25/08/2020

Placement location

Hornicka 900, 66603 Tisnov

Looking for volunteers from

Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Germany, Denmark, Estonia, Greece, Spain, Finland, France, Croatia, Hungary, Ireland, Iceland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Latvia, Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Sweden, Slovenia, Slovakia, Turkey, United Kingdom

Placement topics

Education and training

Placement deadline

Application deadline: 21/04/2019

In order to check if you can apply for this project, you must first Sign In or Join the Corps.
Sign in / Join

Project 32: https://europa.eu//youth/solidarity/placement/12010_en


Volunteer for our Children's group Giraffenland

Children's group Giraffenland

Vienna, Austria

Apply

Project description

Voluteers in our Kindergroup have the opportunity to get in touch with the pedagogical concepts of Maria Montessori, to learn about NonViolentCommunication and other pedagogical directions. The volunteer will be integrated in the children's group by the caretakers, and is happily invited to join the kids and their parents outside of business hours. She/he will be guided and supervised by the well educated local personnel and will also accompany the kids on their natural field trips. From the intensive, open and constant contact with the children and their caretakers we expect a very rewarding time of self-experience and reflection for the participants. We will also organize German courses for the volunteers and support her/him to get comfortable with our language. The selfdevelopment and independence of the volunteers grow in the course of the project. They get help if they need, but they are responsible for their everyday life.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

Our volunteer will either live with one of the parents from the children of our children's group and/or in a flatshare in Vienna. Our volunteer will have his or her own room. He or she will have enough pocket money to arrange his or her own food. During the time at the children's group, food will be provided. As for transport: depending on the location of the room we can provide a bike (Vienna is super bike-friendly) and/or the necessary tickets for public transport.

Training during the project

The volunteer has the opportunity to create his/her own projects and implement own ideas. Own initiative, strengthening self-esteem, and exploring and living their own creativity will be improved and acquired. We have a variety of different pedagogical approaches and focal points (Montessori, Pikler, attentive communication, outdoor, music...), which our volunteer will get to know and has the option to deepen the knowledge. The German language will be practiced daily and we also offer a German course during the stay.

Volunteer profile

Interest and competencies to work with small children (2.5 to 6 years old). We will not restrain ourselves in choosing only volunteers with references in that field, you should be willing and motivated to work with small children. It is indispensable that the children are treated with respect and as self-reliant personalities. The volunteer should be prepared to react to the curiosity and creativity of the children rather than confronting them with a ready-made programme. The volunteer should be interested to share her or his cultural knowledge and be interested in language.

Placement dates

A total of 16 week(s) during the period 01/04/2019 to 31/08/2019

Placement location

Schubertgasse 10, 1090 Vienna

Looking for volunteers from

Italy

Placement topics

Health and wellbeing

Education and training

Creativity and culture

Placement deadline

No application deadline

youth centre of the YMCA Luckau

CVJM Luckau

Luckau, Germany

Apply

Project description

The YMCA Luckau (CVJM Luckau e. V.) organises activities for children and teenagers. It is part of the international YMCA (Young Men’s Christian Association organization). The YMCA Luckau has a clear Christian self-understanding with an interdenominational adjustment. In the "youth center" of the YMCA Luckau children and teenagers are invited to spend their leisure time with other young people during the opening times several days a week in the afternoon. Here they can use table soccer, table tennis, billiards, playing table games or surf the internet. Bands have the opportunity to use the existing instruments (drums, guitar & keyboard) and the technical equipment (microphones, sound system etc.) being assisted in their musical work by the staff. During holidays and weekends other projects, activities or trips are offered from time to time. Tasks: 1. youth work 2.to support Christian youth groups 3.to take part in work with children 4.Sporty activities 5. Camps and holiday trips

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteer will live in an own flat. He/she will be accompanied by a mentor.

Training during the project

Language course in German, intercultural training, training for the youth leader card in Germany

Volunteer profile

Great interest to work with children and young peole, German language skills, open for our Christian profile, able to build relationship with children and young people, team spirit, sportive and active person

Join the MasterPeace club with EVS/ESC in Tbilisi, Georgia

Caucasus Youth Nexus

TBILISI, Georgia

Apply

Project description

Caucasus Youth Nexus runs a club of “MasterPeace Georgia” which was founded in 2013 and has carried out plenty of interesting and fruitful projects. MasterPeace focuses on actively engaging people around the world in peace-building actions. MasterPeace offers a platform for a large community of Nelsons; social entrepreneurs, volunteers, bloggers, journalists, media, musicians, businesses and active citizens to connect together and support with actions. Main topics of work for Masterpeace club are music, art, dialogue and creativity. Another direction of our organization is “Rotaract Club of Tbilisi International” founded in early 2018 and since then is actively involved in the social development. It has four main directions: Rotaract Health, Rotaract Peace, Rotaract Growth and Rotaract Green. Mainly this club focuses on charity, non-formal educational activities and awareness raising campaigns regarding the important social challenges of our community.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteer will receive 150 Euro's as food allowance each month (including pocket money and local transportation), directly from the sending organization. Volunteers will live in a shared apartment in the city center near to organization’s office (5-10 minutes by local transport and 20 minutes by walk,) volunteer will have its own bedroom or will be sharing room with maximum one more person. They will use shared bathroom. In the apartment volunteers will have, refrigerator, kitchen supplies and a washing machine and all the necessary things needed for everyday life.

Volunteer profile

oung persons from from 18 to 30 years who are interested to work with different people. - Willingness to learn Georgian - Interested in working with youth, interested in democracy/history/politics - Able to take own initiative - Interested in the Caucasus area

Become a volunteer in the ancient city of Vinnytsia, Ukraine

NGO "Nashe Podillia"

Vinnytsia, Ukraine

Apply

Project description

The YouthInsight project has three main aims: 1) Training of skills like ICT, media literacy, team-work, project and event management, sense of initiative, and empowerment of youth in the audio-visual sphere; 2) Disseminating ideas of audio-visual materials on a larger scale and promotion of amateur media production, self-expression of youth through the created outputs; 3) Build-up of intercultural dialogue. The activity for the EVS volunteers is leading of the cultural and linguistic clubs for the local citizens. He clubs are held in public youth centers and visited by curious teenagers and students mostly. EVS volunteers are cordially asked to join other activities of the hosting organization and its partners.

Accommodation, food and transport arrangements

The volunteer will receive 90 Euros as food subsidy each month, 55 Euros of monthly allowance and a monthly local transportation contribution directly from the hosting organization or from the sending organization. This amount roughly equals the average salary in the region. The volunteer will be accommodated in one apartment with other volunteers each having a separate room, up to 3 volunteers in one apartment, or in the dormitory but having a separate room in any of the cases. The apartment/dormitory is situated near the transport routes that lead to every part of the city and to our office.

Training during the project

The volunteer will be provided by the personal language tutoring once or twice per week for half year period. As well it will be possible for the volunteer to attend Ukrainian clubs for foreigners organized by the hosting organization once per week. As well there will be a chance to organize the language tandems: exchange of Dutch language teaching for a local one – Ukrainian or Russian. In her/his activities the volunteer will be assisted by the spoken and written translations from the side of the support personnel.

Volunteer profile

Young persons from from 18 to 30 years who are interested to work with different people with different backgrounds. - willingness to learn Ukrainian - interested in working with people - able to take own initiative - interested in Eastern Europe

Placement dates

A total of 20 week(s) during the period 01/05/2019 to 31/05/2020

Placement location

Ivan Bohun 2, office 407,, 21000 Vinnytsia
